name: Annabella
two: Hitting a target with a Flame weapon increases final damage by **3%/3.4%/3.8%/4.2%** and final crit rate by **2%/2%/2.4%/2.4%** for **25** seconds, up to **2** stacks. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
four: Equip 2 or more Flame weapons to activate the "Flowing Flames" effect; increase final damage by **7%/8%/9%/10%**, and after a critical hit increase crit damage by **12%/14%/16%/18%** for **25** seconds. When the charged attack hits an enemy **3** times, recover **1** dodge, cooldown **2** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.

name: Tian Lang
two: Dealing volt damage has a **40%** chance to release chain lightning, dealing **50%/65%/90%/120%** of volt ATK to up to **7** targets, cooldown **2** seconds. Triggering the lightning chain increases volt damage by **6%** for **6** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, only the highest star set will take effect.
four: Using a volt weapon's skill or discharge skill increases volt damage by **12%/14%/16%/18%** for **15** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, only the highest star set will take effect.

name: Lyra
two: Using this weapon grants a **13%/17%/21%/25%** ATK buff. The lower your health, the higher your healing received, up to **100%**.
four: When dealing physical damage, increase physical damage by 2.7% with a cooldown of 0.1 seconds. Stack up to 5 times. Upon reaching the maximum stacks, increase physical damage by an additional 3.5%/7%/10.5%/14% for 5 seconds. Only the highest star rating's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly. Obtain 1 block for each dodge, blocking damage up to 60% of current HP, but not less than 20% of Max HP. Stack up to 3 blocks for 10 seconds.

name: Lin
two: Increase ATK by **2.1%/2.6%/3.1%/3.6%** on hit for **18** seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Only the effect of the highest level is applied when obtained repeatedly.
four: Every 5m traveled within Moonlight Realm grants 1 stack of Moonlight, increasing final damage by **4%/4.9%/5.8%/6.7%** for 15 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

name: Ruby
two: Increases flame ATK after casting weapon skill by **8%/10%/12%/15%** for **25** seconds. If multiple star rating effects are triggered, the one triggered last prevails. This effect does not stack.
four: Grant Mastery after casting weapon skill for **15** seconds, with a cooldown of **15** seconds (Mastery shares cooldowns across levels). Mastery is not stackable. Increases flame damage by **2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%** every time the target is hit with a normal attack until the end of Mastery. Stacks up to **6** times, adding a maximum of **1** stack every **0.2** seconds. At **6** stacks, grants a shield that can block damage **1** time.

name: Cobalt-B
two: Restore **1* dodge every **4** dodges. Dodge attacks add burn to the target, dealing **13%/17%/21%/25%** attack damage per second for **10** seconds.
four: Increases damage by **13%/17%/21%/25%** to targets with abnormal statuses

name: Claudia
two: Increase damage by **13%/17%/20%/23%** when hitting a target in mid-air or initiating an aerial attack. Reset double-jump upon hitting the target in mid-air.
four: Hitting an enemy with a skill reduces the cooldowns of all weapon skills by **1.5/2/2.5/3** seconds and increases the damage of discharge skills by **58%/80%/103%/126%** for **15** seconds.

name: Huma
two: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to **15%/19%/22.5%/26%** of ATK every second for **5** seconds.
four: Reduce ATK of all targets within 8 meters that are taking damage over time by **10%/12%/13%/15%**. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

name: Frigg
two: Increase frost ATK by **8%/10%/12%/15%** for **10** seconds when switching between frost weapons. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
four: When unleashing a frost domain with the weapon "Balmung", enemies within the frost domain receive frost damage equal to **55%/65%/75%/85%** of frost ATK every second.

name: Nemesis
two: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by **8%/10%/12%/15%** for **20** seconds. The effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
four: When healing yourself or your Electrode, the healed target gains a charge of "Lightning". The next attack within **30** seconds will cast lightning upon the target, dealing volt damage equal to **240%/300%/360%/420%** of volt ATK, and damage caused by electrodes is reduced by 50%. Cannot be triggered more than once in **10** seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

name: Coco Ritter
two: Increase healing capability and healing received by **10%/12%/14%/16%**.
four: When you or your teammates are healed, increase ATK by **12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%** for **6** seconds. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

name: Crow
two: Increase crit damage to targets with less than **60%** HP by **24%/30%/36%/42%**.
four: Crits deal additional damage over time equal to **18%/22%/26%/30%** of ATK every second for **5** seconds. Does not stack.

name: King
two: When a target is shattered, grant **8%/10%/12%/14%** damage boost for **25** seconds. Only the highest level is applied when the effect is obtained repeatedly.
four: When there are more than 2 enemies around, hits restore HP equal to **14%/18%/22%/26%** of damage dealt upon attacking. The maximum HP restored every **0.5** seconds must not exceed **36%/42%/48%/54%** of ATK.

name: Meryl
two: If HP is less than **30%** after being attacked, gain a shield equal to **20%/26%/32%/40%** of Max HP for **10** seconds. Cooldown: **90** seconds.
four: Increase Whirlwind's damage by 36%/45%/54%/63% and restore HP equal to **30%/38%/44%/50%** of the damage dealt while Whirlwind is active. The maximum HP restored every **0.5 seconds** cannot exceed **60%/72%/81%/90%** of ATK.

name: Samir
two: Increase damage progressively by **1%** upon hitting a target. Stack up to **10/13/16/20** times. Lasts **1.5** seconds.
four: Increase Dual EM Stars' electrical explosion damage by **16%/22%/30%/40%** of ATK.

name: Shiro
two: Increase both damage and shatter to targets with more than **50%** HP by **15%/19%/22.5%/26%**.
four: Upon entering battle, gain a **20%/25%/30%/35%** damage boost for **35** seconds. Reset **5** seconds after exiting battle.

name: Tsubasa
two: Increase damage dealt by **14%/16%/18%/20%** when there are no enemies within 4 meters.
four: Upon a headshot or using Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by **15%/18%/21%/25%** for **8** seconds.

name: Zero
two: Upon using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon, gain a shield equal to **150%/200%/250%/300%** of ATK for **6** seconds.
four: While the shield is active, you and your teammates deal **16%/20%/24%/28%** more damage.

name: Bai Ling
three: Increase damage dealt to grievous targets by **12%/15%/18%**.

name: Echo
three: Using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon grants **80/100/120** weapon charge.

name: Ene
three: When dealing damage greater than **100%** of ATK, deal additional damage equal to **60%/75%/90%** of ATK. Cooldown: **3** seconds.

name: Hilda
three: Increase ATK by **15%/19%/22.5%** when there are no enemies within 6 meters.

name: Pepper
three: Increase speed of obtaining weapon charge by **10%/12.5%/15%**.

name: Robarg
three: When a target is shattered, poison the target and deal damage equal to **45%/56%/67.5%** of ATK every second for **10** seconds.

name: Apophis
three: Deal higher damage at lower HP. Deal maximum damage when HP is **20%**. The damage can be increased by up to **20%/25%/30%**.

name: Frost Bot
three: When HP is below **40%**, using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon restores HP equal to **160%/200%/240%** of ATK.

name: Sobek
three: Increase damage dealt by **6%/7.5%/9%** for each enemy nearby. Up to 3 stacks.

name: Barbarossa
three: Upon switching to the weapon, gain **50%/62.5%/75%** damage reflection for **3** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds. Upon switching to another weapon, gain a **20%/25%/30%** damage boost for **5** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

name: Self Explosive
three: Increase damage dealt by flame weapons by **6%**.

name: Functional Dash
three: Increase damage dealt by frost weapons by **6%**.

name: Standard Operation
three: Increase damage dealt by volt weapons by **6%**.

name: Plunder
three: Increase damage dealt by physical weapons by **6%**.
